sentences.en: " And was still operating, on Mr. Dimmesdale's well - being and repose . "
sentences.cn: 而且那机器仍在 开动,他还得忍受.

sentences.en: All was tranquility and repose. Suddenly into the picture staggered Walter Cronkite.
sentences.cn: 一切都安谧与恬静. 突然,沃尔特?克朗凯特蹒跚着闯入了画面.

sentences.en: All was tranquillity and repose. Suddenly into the picture staggered Walter Cronkite.
sentences.cn: 一切都安谧与恬静. 突然,沃尔特·克朗凯特蹒跚着闯入了画面.

sentences.en: He had a still, almost blank face in repose.
sentences.cn: 他休息时面部平静，几乎毫无表情。

sentences.en: Her mouth seemed always to be smiling, even in repose.
sentences.cn: 她的嘴角似乎总是挂着微笑, 即使在睡眠时也是这样.

sentences.en: How calmly the clouds seem to repose in heaven.
sentences.cn: 云彩多么平静地停留在天空中.

sentences.en: It was four o'clock before the camp sought repose.
sentences.cn: 直到四点钟营地的人们才打算去歇息.

sentences.en: Its atmosphere is one of repose rather than excitement.
sentences.cn: 那里气氛安宁而不热闹。

sentences.en: Near the Azores, just below the sunlit Atlantic surface, sperm whales float in vertical repose.
sentences.cn: 在亚速尔群岛附近，大西洋表面太阳照射不到的地方，抹香鲸垂直着身体休息。

sentences.en: Repose of manner is an estimable trait in a horse.
sentences.cn: 神情镇定是一匹马可贵的特质.

sentences.en: She obeyed the signal to wait for him with unspeculative repose.
sentences.cn: 她无情无绪、老老实实地听从了那个人让她等候的手势.

sentences.en: The boundless woods were sleeping in the deep repose of nature.
sentences.cn: 无边无际的森林在大自然静寂的怀抱中酣睡着.
这么舒适的沙发不由得让人想躺下休息。

sentences.en: The repose of Marian became more and more disturbed.
sentences.cn: 玛丽安的睡眠越来越不安静了.

sentences.en: They lay very far from repose.
sentences.cn: 他们哪里能有什么安息可言呵.

sentences.en: We repose complete confidence in his honesty.
sentences.cn: 我们完全相信他的诚实.

words.tran_cn: 休息；座落；长眠；依靠；静卧；建立于

trans.tran_en: a state of calm or comfortable rest
Repose is a state in which you are resting and feeling calm
if something reposes somewhere, it has been put there

trans.tran_cn: 将（手臂等）靠在某人（某物）上
